title: Endpoint /eth/v1/validator/aggregate_and_proofs does not accept valid input

body:
Thanks again @mcdee, this is because we haven't implemented accepting arrays here yet.  Additionally I've raised an issue [here](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-APIs/issues/106). To update the `attestation` field name to `aggregate`. Our implementation expects `aggregate` at present.  

I am going to update this to accept arrays early next week.
